content.detailedDescription: Nous etions le 10 septembre 2011 aux alentours de 23h. je m en souviens tres bien car c etait le jour de mon anniversaire.Ce soir lã , ma meilleure amie m invite ã  dã®ner avec mes 2 enfants.  une fois le repas terminã©, j ai suggã©rã© de faire un tour en voiture dans le village. arrivã©e sur l avenue principale, des boules lumineuses attirent mon attention, et je me gare devant les hlm pour observer, nous etions scotchã©s  ( mes enfants de 4 et 5 ans etaient lã  et ont vu aussi). j ai ã©teint le moteur de la voiture , il y avait absolument aucun bruit. par la suite les 3 premieres boules se sont muse ã  la verticale et les autres suivaient derriã¨re en file indienne.  j ai rallumã© le moteur pour les suivre jusqu'ã  la sortie du village puis je me suis arrãªtã© et je les aient regardã© partir.
content.summary: Plusieurs boules oranges se suivaient sans bruit. en premier lieu, elles se suivaient ensuite 3 des boules se sont allignees ã  la verticale et les autres boules derriã¨re continuaient ã  suivre.

content.detailedDescription:
It was near dusk and i was recording and taking images with my oneplus x smartphone for a personal work. it was just after a light rain and the sky was clear and i take that as a chance to take some really good photos. i burst the image by pressing down and hold the camera button. after that, i went up to my room to copy the images and videos taken onto my laptop. but it wasn't until 6 months later that i realized something really odd showed up in one of the burst image. i don't remember how many i taken but i kept only the last 4 image of that sky. it was a clear sky on the first and the second image but it was my friend izzat who pointed out there something in the sky of the third image. we were shocked when we zoom in on it. it looks like a dome-disc shape ufo kinda thing. what is more thrilling is that on the fourth image the object disappeared and there is a lightning in front from where the object was. i didn't notice that there was lightning at that time. these image was taken in really short seconds and it was able to captured that kind of thing under a few second makes me wonder how fast the whole thing happened ? 
i have attached the images accordingly. the image have not been tampered or edited in any way. it was copied from folders to folders. you can see in the detailed properties that it was taken under the same minute.
content.summary: I was taking burst images of the clear skies after a rain

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the west side of the island of oahu,hawaii.
it was around 3am. and i was taking pictures of the brighter stars in the sky. i do this a lot because of what comes out when i crop the photos. i feel that the object is obviously not a star but more so a craft of some sort. the objects are there every night and they are the brightest stars in the sky. taken with my iphone.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of the brightest stars in the night time sky's and this is what one of them came out to be.

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
While sitting outside i noticed a large flash, then another in another location. within an hour through my monocular night vision, the movement between what appeared to be stars became apparent. in all directions but most densely coming from the south w to the north w, were combining, separating and positioning all over the sky. at one point i almost felt the cloud above may have been masking a ufo much larger a football field. clouds were very thick, but thin, moved steadily across the sky but made sure not to cross over the moon, only the edges would momentarily and the stark white moons light showed that the cloud was actually rust colored. never could verify the large object but all the other triangles and erratically moving "lights" all kept above and around the cloud...
before noticing this cloud but after noticing first cluster of lights moving along in west, moving from the south to north, shortly after i observed it and flashed it with my own ir illuminator it quickly moved out of eye sight behind hills/trees.  about 10 mins a very loud military sounding helicopter flew directly over my property. and about ten minutes after this, i noticed a plane coming from nw to se, normal in all assumptions except for the very faint (only visible in monocular) traveling behind it.

observed approximately
6-8 sets of triangles, one of which almost reflected back off my ir light, best guess on size was private plane
9-14 individual lights gathered in the direction of the south west (nearest arial landmark would be the litter dioper

3 extremely brights slow moving objects that gave off streaky, almost ethereal glow toward one direction)  one halogen headlight blue, and the other two were a white/orange.

1 helicopter

1 plane (along with unknown object fairly near to it)

1 very curious mass of cloud, flat, thick, (copper/rust red) and varied speeds of motion with possibility that also somehow perfectly never let the moons light fall behind it which would have cleared my vision. 


by the time i noticed the group and the singular objects, it was as if  they already knew and began watching me back, because
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: With nightvision monocular many triangles could be observed, very wierd cloud density/movements/color

content.detailedDescription: I had just finished moving my truck to one side of the driveway, when i got out i felt something was above me when i looked up to the sky i saw an object static in the sky, the object was not moving at that time, the object looked like a contact lens with something that looked like transparent circular spheres one on each end on both there was a beam kind of white light one of them produced like some kind of energy that traveled around the bottom edge of the abject and hit the other sphere then the abject started moving horizontally but slowly, at that time i run for my cell phone inside the house, when i came back to start recording it was high up in the sky, then i saw a second object in a higher position at that time my son came out of the house to join me. i felt happy to see this object it looked beautiful to me, i was kind of nervous also because i could not identified it with something that we normally see in the sky. i was totally convinced that the objects were not drones, airplanes or helicopters, i could not hear any sound nor see any trail from any engine. i lost sight of them when they entered the clouds, i tried to get my telescope but did not have time to set it up that is when the video ended.
content.summary: After i park my truck in the driveway i felt something was above me, i looked up and saw one static object in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was up all night with sick kids so when this happened. i thought my "tired" mind was playing tricks on me. i saw a glow of light light up my window sill in front of my computer desk. i then looked out of the window to see if someone had pulled into my driveway. i noticed a decent size light in the sky not too far above the power lines along my street. the light was not moving and was very bright white. it only took about a minute or two from the time i started watching it for it to shine a beam of light down on the side of the road. the light beam only lasted a few seconds but afterwards it all went away. no more light and no more beam.  
i never saw it again. completely silent. not a noise at all was heard. the next morning, i went outside to look around and noticed that the snow had fallen everywhere but one spot. a perfect circle of bare grass with snow all around it. it is the weirdest thing.
content.summary: I saw a light from outside my window. light was hovering over the street and projected a beam of light down to the street.

content.detailedDescription: I was  driving down a desolate country road leaving my friends house about 1 am one night. no other cars were on the road at the time it was very dark but about a mile ahead of me i could see extremely bright red flashing lights. i thought it was a wreck  of some sort with ambulances. the closer i got the more it looked different. when i came to my turn i stopped in the intersection. there was an object in the field to my right. no more than 50 feet away. it was extremely bright red flashing lights. all flashing sporadically. it was shaped like a bowl on the bottom with a dark center. the red lights outlined the bowl shape and there was two long arms that came out from either side of the top of the bowl per se with red flashing lights. i sat at the intersection with my windows down listening for anything. there was no noise sound nothing. there was a farmhouse down the way but there was no movement or lights on in the house. i sat and watch this object for over 10 minutes. while i was watching it all the lights were flashing as it was doing before and then all of a sudden in the center of the object between the two long arms two extremely solid bright red lights just instantly turned on. while all the other lights were flashing. these two big red lights  just were solid red. as i was watching this they started to raise up together and slowly go up to the very top of where the two arms that protruded. from the outside edges it was equal across the top.  this thing was flashing massively bright red lights plus these two giant solid  red lights. i was stunned, i was shaking and still no noise. as i’m watching this in disbelief all of the lights instantly turned off . everything’  was black where it was just a second before. at that moment i floored my car and took off. in hindsight i wish i would’ve stayed but it was a truly frightening experience not knowing what that was. it was not a plane, helicopter ect.  this thing was very very strange. at that moment i floored my car and took off. in hindsight i wish i would’ve stayed but it was a truly frightening experience not knowing what that was. . this happened over 30 years ago and i am still haunted by this today. i live in the same area and when i drive on  that road i still remember that night. i will never forget it. there was a ufo in that field i know it was. the next day i even went to the farmers houses to ask them if they had seen anything that night. they said no but they had told me that they’ve seen things in these fields in the past that was very weird. this is my story.  it is true
content.summary: I was driving in a country road and saw bright red flashing lights in a field. saw it 1mile away then up close at my turn. incredibly brute red flashing lights.

content.detailedDescription: On jan 5 2018 i was sitting outside facing south south east in fresno, ca. @ about 8:45 pm when what appeared to be an oval object that was lit up but had defined edges flying way too fast to be a plane or jet.It wasn't going like flash like a falling star usually does but faster than any jet. it did not have a tail and when it appeared and disappeared it did it in a snap, no fading or burning out. it did not fly at an angle towards the earth, it flew parallel to the surface and maintained altitude and actually seemed to gain altitude before it disappeared in a blink of an eye. it appeared to be very high up but was under the clouds, the sky was almost entirely covered by clouds. the instant it appeared i knew i was seeing a craft but it took me a second to realize it was like nothing i have ever seen in my entire life. it flew in a straight line but almost seemed to have a tiny wobble or a slight pulsating appearance to it as it flew and the size was about the size of a button on a tv remote. the whole ordeal only lasted about 4 seconds but luckily i just happened to be looking up at the sky when it appeared, it appeared the same way it disappeared, in a snap like turning on a light switch. it's hard to explain, i've never seen anything like it. it was big, it was fast and i could see it perfectly. when it blinked out i stood up and the hair on my neck and arms stood up and i said to myself "i think i just saw a freaking ufo!" i really hope someone else saw it!
content.summary: I observed an oval shaped lighted object that appeared large. it appeared in an instant and flew in a straight line for about 3 or 4 seconds then blinked out like a snap. very fast, faster than any plane or jet can travel. it wasn't a falling star.

content.detailedDescription:
I'm a police officer in lawrence county, ohio. i have witnessed a triangle shaped craft 2 days in a row back in the summer of 2016. the craft was very large, had 3 bright white lights, one on each point, as well as a pulsating red light in the center of the craft.

myself and my girlfriend at the time were traveling eastbound on st rt 52 towards chesapeake, oh, to visit her friends who had just got a new house in chesapeake. i was in the passenger seat of her vehicle. about the time we made it to the south point, oh, i noticed a large triangular craft hovering about a mile above the ohio river. as described above, the craft had 3 bright white lights, one on each point, as well as a slowly pulsating red light in the center. the craft was not moving, just hovering and looked to be right above the river, and seemed to be pointing westbound towards ironton. as we got closer, the craft slowly turned and seemed to be pointing north. the craft hovered there for approx 5-10 seconds before moving slowly north as we passed directly below it, until it went over the hill out of sight. the craft could not have been traveling more than 20mph, and if it was,i would be surprised. this craft is not like anything i had ever seen before, except on ufo tv shows as well as videos on youtube, so i was really surprised and excited because i had never witnessed one in person before. i had taken pictures of it on my iphone 6, but no longer use that phone since i switched to the iphone 7.

the very next night, while with my parents at their friend's residence having a bonfire on their hill which overlooks the city of ironton, oh, i as well as my parents and their friends witnessed the same craft flying westbound and seemed to be directly over ironton. this time the craft was not alone. the craft had 2 different pairs  of blinking lights trailing behind it, such as you would see on any conventional aircraft. one set of the blinking lights was behind the craft and  off the left "point", the other set of blinking was behind and off the right point of the craft, as if they were following it or escorting it. the craft as well as the blinking lights slowly moved across the sky and out of sight.


*please note the dates i had listed are not accurate, these occurrences were around the time of june or july of 2016. also, if i locate my other phone, i will submit to you all the photos i had taken.*
content.summary: I'm a police officer in lawrence county, ohio. i witnessed a triangular shaped craft 2 days in a row.

content.detailedDescription: it was around 9pm when me and my boyfriend went outside to sit in the hot tub and we like to watch meteor showers and look for falling stars about 9:27pm we saw a craft with dim triangles shaped lights about 6 of them going ne over webb city mo it was heading away from the airport ... it was lower than airplanes would fly.... it was not making any noise and we watched it go ne for about 25 seconds then we couldn't see it anymore. at first thought it was a flock of geese... but no sounds and it stayed in perfect formation.... we searched online to see of there had been other sightings and many matched exactly what we witnessed, then we found this website to report it.   thanks
content.summary: Was in hot tub looking up at sky and watched silent triangle  craft with dim lights

content.detailedDescription: My brother witnessed the event back in 2013.  his buddy called him and said to go outside because objects were flying through the sky and were coming towards my parents' house in brookville, pa. when he went outside, it was a matter of seconds before the ufos were flying over. he was able to snap a picture.. but they were gone in a matter of seconds.
content.summary: Orange objects in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Ok so first of all i have never been the type to go straight to sleep even as a child. when i was 6 years old roughly 1990 we lived in mount washington kentucky near fort knox. i could hear the tanks going off all the time. one night i woke up and saw this object hovering over the middle school football field that was behind our house. it seemed to be staying still but had red green and yellow and blue lights underneath it circling the bottom of it. i woke my mother and we went out into the backyard to see what was going on. it was hovering right overtop of a goal post and was at least 50 yards wide completely circular. now i dont remember going to bed or even going inside i remember waking up the next day. fast forward  to 2009 i was stationed at fort knox as apart of the 1/16 cavalry training brigade. another soldier and i were doing squadron detail when we notoced relatively the same thing hovering over a nearby field we knew it wasnt a helicopter or a plane so we decided to take it to higher ups who gave us the number to talk to air control tower on base. we called and they said they werent picking up anything irregular on radar but sent out a leiutinant. when he saw it he immediately started snapping pictures and calling someone apparently having a heated conversation. the next few days we had to give witness statements and were told not to discuss what would happen because no one knew offically what happened. about a week later our 1sg told us in his office it was just a weather ballon. thing is we had seen a weather ballon go up and we both knew this was much much larger. i think maybe something alien is in the vault at fort knox. sorry this was so long. also i dont know of i was abducted or not as i dont have many of the signs of an abductee.
content.summary: Ufo was hovering above a football field behind my house and later just about the same one i saw at fort knox

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was at a random street in hong kong taking pictures

2. i didn’t see the object until i took a picture in the sky.

3.I didn’t know what it was

4.Flying across the sky

5.Curious

6. i looked at the photos i took and looked at the sky and it was gone.
content.summary: Took a picture and saw the lights

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was walking down the kahlenhill
2. bright lightballs above me
3. some physical electric balls
4. very fast moving and the balls seemed a bit to follow each other (or had a coonection to each other)
5. astonished, (rigid, fixed, stiff), a bit hypnotized
possibly got abducted, because i have a really bad memory of it and don't remember when it happened. i was a child.
6. it just take off
content.summary: 3 bright lights

content.detailedDescription:
J'ã©tais avec des amis en voiture vers intermarchã© violette d'orange quand nous avons aperã§u quatre points rouges/oranges dans le ciel. ils se dã©plaã§ait ã  vitesse moyenne, pas trã¨s vite, mais les quartes points ã©taient tous ã  une distance ã©gale et dormaient une ligne. sur le moment j'ai ue peur puis j'ai pensã© que cela pouvait ãªtre des lanternes chinoises, cependant je ne pense pas que des lanternes puissent rester parallã¨les et voler ã  la mãªme vitesse en mãªme temps. je le ai perdu de vu puis revu et perdu pour de bon car nous ã©tions en voiture et certains bã¢timents/arbres nous gã¢chaient la vue. j'ai tentã© de les prendre en photo mais ce n'ã©tais pas visible ã  la camã©ra.

content.detailedDescription:
Went to work this morning and noticed a really nice halo around the sun. thought i would take a pic as it was beautiful. took two photos consecutively so that i could pick the best of the two at a later time.
when i later looked at the photos, i noticed an orb over the sun that appears to have moved vertically within one second. size and distance are unknown.
content.summary: Took two consecutive  photos of sun halo. later noticed glowing orb

content.detailedDescription: Driving south on highway 75 15 miles north of tulsa and a very bright light hovered back to the east for about 20 minutes.  as i approached tulsa it shot off to the ne and disappeared.  to make sure it was not a star i used my star location app and none appeared there.
content.summary: Hovered where no lights have been int he past.  then shot off to ne

content.detailedDescription: Same details as above, was returning from visiting a friend. i was walking at the time. it came from behind a fence. it appeared to be looking for something on the ground. it noticed me when i made a noise. then sqawked at me and took off heading north towards michigan. it was joined by another one much smaller.
content.summary: saw entity walking, turned toward me, sqauwked loudly, flapped wings, (could hear and feel wing movement took off toward north, joined by second one already in air. didn't see second one until first took off

content.detailedDescription: Bonjour, avec 4 amis nous sommes aller passer le rã©veillon 2010/2011 au ski ã  la station de moutier miribel aprã¨s une bonne raclette nous sommes descendu de notre chalet par les pistes de ski pour rejoindre le centre de la station. aprã¨s quelques minutes de marche ã  environs 23h30 dans le ciel 3 boules lumineuses on attirã© notre attention elles ã©tait plutã´t grosse et brillait d une maniã¨re trã¨s particuliã¨re un scintillement jamais vue au paravent. nous les avons observã© plusieurs minutes et en un clignement de cils les objets on disparu. ã€ ce moment mes amis et moi mãªme ce sont demander si on avait pas eu une allucination et notre rã©ponse a ã©tã© "on peu pas avoir une allucination tout les 5 en mãªme temps et en voyant la mãªme chose" ce qui nous rassurer mutuellement ^^ depuis nous espã©rons un jour avoir une rã©ponse ã  cette question : qu'es ce que c'ã©tait ?
content.summary: Boule de feu

nous rentrons chez ma famille
nous ã©tions ã  pied vers 22h30 23h le 24 dã©cembre 2017

3. a un ovni
cela semble bizarre mais j'ai pensã© ã  sa directement

4. il y avait deux objets de couleur orange

content.detailedDescription:
Je rentrai chez moi ã  pied vers 18 heures, je marchais sur mon chemin et je vis des lumiã¨res, mais elles ne faisaient pas de bruit, je pensais donc ã  un avion. puis je remarquais que cet appareil volait ã  basse altitude, tout en ne faisant aucun bruit. je rentre chez moi et dis ã  mon pã¨re de sortir, il l'aperã§oit aussi et me dit que c'est un drone, il me dit aussi qu'il a dã©jã  vu passer juste avant en cherchant un objet ã  lâ€™extã©rieur. puis nous avons remarquã© que ces lumiã¨res faisaient des zigzags, elles se dã©plaã§aient rapidement et sans bruit et malgrã© la prã©sence de jumelles elles restaient inobservables du fait qu'elles paraissaient floues comme si elles se cachaient. la portã©e de ces lumiã¨res ã©tait trop grande pour ãªtre un drone, elles clignotaient sans arrãªt en rouge et bleu et quelquefois en blanc, plusieurs se sont mise ã  apparaã®tre, venant d'un autre endroit. nous avons vu six lumiã¨res apparaã®tre venant du mãªme endroit avec un intervalle d'apparition de 10 minutes, avec la mãªme altitude et la mãªme trajectoire (rectiligne). seule la premiã¨re fit un cercle puis disparu. une d'elles restait en stationnaire ã  une haute altitude. puis vint un moment ou deux se dirigeaient dans la mãªme direction, mon pã¨re et moi prirent les jumelles pour regarder ce qui allait se passer, une fois proches les deux appareils clignotaient avec leurs lumiã¨res blanches, puis une (la plus haute en altitude) fit apparaã®tre un faisceau lumineux (comme dans les films) semblables ã  ceux des hã©licoptã¨res de la police. lâ€™appareil qui fut ã©clairer (on ne put distinguer sa forme car trop loin) se mit ã  repartir vers son point d'origine et disparus entre-temps, malgrã© les lumiã¨res on ne l'apercevait plus. le faisceau de la premiã¨re resta allumã© pendant 3 minutes environ puis elle partit au loin. ma mã¨re put faire une vidã©o oã¹ on peut voir l'objet clignoter et se dã©placer.

ce qui me fit le plus remarquer la lumiã¨re ã©tait le fait qu'elle nâ€™ã©mettait aucun bruit malgrã© son altitude, connaissant et possã©dant un drone je pus clairement rejeter cette hypothã¨se, du fait de la portã©e, du bruit et de ses mouvements.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Je rentrai chez moi ã  pied vers 18 heures, je marchais sur mon chemin et je vis des lumiã¨res, mais elles ne faisaient pas de bruit, je pensais donc ã  un avion. puis je remarquais que cet appareil volait ã  basse altitude, tout en ne faisant aucun bruit

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 0625 i checked for morning weather through a door window and first observed incredibly bright (i estimated they were led-type lights) red and white flashing lights to the south/southwest.  i went outside to observe.  the lights moved west/east slightly, hovering just above treetop level; i could hear no sound at this point.  my initial inclination was that the object was a drone because it was hovering so steadily; however, when the lights moved to a position behind a distant palm tree, i discounted that it was a drone because, if it was a drone, the size would have to be incredibly large.  i also discounted that it was a blimp as there was no discernable outline of an object - i was simply seeing lights.  i also discounted that it was an aircraft (on approach or otherwise) because the lights were far too bright for any aircraft that i had ever seen (i am a former air traffic controller and flight navigator) and the object did not appear to be approaching/closing in my direction.  moreover, the lights, in the configuration i was witnessing, didn't fit any that i'd seen in my 12 year aviation career.  at some point, the lights began a direct movement toward the east/southeast, remaining just above treetop level all the while.  interestingly, the light configuration and pace of flashing did not change when departing in that direction.  it was then, just after departing, that i heard what seemed to be a pulsating sound, very low in intensity and at a pace of about 2 pulses per second.  the object continued east/southeast and remained just above treetop level until it disappeared at the horizon.  (i could sketch a drawing if needed.)
content.summary: Flashing red and white lights, hovering at first in the south before departing to the east and a pulsating sound heard only upon departure

content.detailedDescription:
J'ã©tait dans mon jardin pour faire pipi

qu'est ce que c'est ce truc lã

content.detailedDescription:
Back then i was joging every night almost. at that period i was intereset in ufo so i was looking at the sky often. this night, it was late about 22 hours, dark. just outside my home door i saw a light in the sky, somewhat bigger than a star that was moving in the sky randomly and fast and disappeared gradually. 
i went to jogging, it is one remote street outside the community. it was dark, no street lights over there. at the end of the road a saw stron lights, like lights from a car, a pair of lights just like a car lights, very strong ones. and yes i thought it is a car that is shining the lights on me. they were very strong a persistent and they irritated me so i pick up a stone and throw it towards the light. throw another one i think but no change or reaction. after that i think i went home and that was it.
next morning on m palm i saw something strange. about 1cm in diameter, ovar scar tissue, young scar tissue (called glomerulous scar tissue, it is still very young and pink-know that because i'm a doctor). i had + lines or like a cross, like made from a scalpel. so imagine it like a circle with a big plus sign in it.
when i saw this mark on my hand i was thinking how did that this get there and then the last night event started to be suspicious. the wound healed in 3 days completely. it is strange to heal so fast. no scar at that place.
that is my story.
content.summary: Before jogging saw a light, then in darrk saw lights...Next morning had some strange scar tissue on my arm/palm

content.detailedDescription:
Suite au reportage paru ce 05/01/2018 dans la provence, je vous communique notre constatation du 25 dã©cembre 2017, (je dis bien 25 et non 24), entre 18heures et 18h30, raccompagnant des membres de ma famille ã  leur voiture, j'ai eu mon attention attirã©e par deux lumiã¨res orange de forme ronde, sans traã®nã©e, se dã©plaã§ant ã  la mãªme vitesse direction ne vers no (gordes > bã©darrides) ã  relativement basse altitude, ã  une distance ã©valuã©e entre 5 et 10 km. 
ces 2 ovnis ayant disparu derriã¨re des constructions, une 3eme est apparue sur la mãªme trajectoire, ã  une vitesse supã©rieure, comme si elle voulait rattraper les 2 premiã¨res. 

constatations faites alors que nous nous trouvions dans le secteur immã©diat relevã© sur google earth :43â°55'37.47"n et 5â°04'02.23"e.
content.summary: Suspition de lanterne taã¯landaise ou autre ?

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work in helena in front of murdocks.Object looked like a hot air balloon at first.As i drove under i slowed down directly under the object.Street lights reflected off the bottom of a grey shiny yet dull metal.  i stopped the car and got out. looking directly over my head. no sound or lights. it looked to be a massive metal boomerang that had seams to it where big parts came together like a hit air ballon seams. due to the objects size and way the light reflected off it i cant correctly judge the size of this object. the lights reflection looked like small spots on it as it took up most of the open sky. it was coming from the east going slowly to the west. then as it got out of under the street lights it disappeared as there was no light on the side streets to aluminate it. there was no sound. no lights.  no windows.  it was directly over head for a full minute. this object gave no indication if it was occupied or by whom or what. after a full minute of it flying over my head as i was out of my car in the middle of the street i followed it south in my car where it cleared the street lights ans disappeared. stunned is how i felt.  who would believe me? i was alone with no proof of what happened.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Unknown
content.summary: Dark shiny metal ballon seams boomerang shape massive slow directly overhead

content.detailedDescription: I witnessed it first and then we fly over a dam then we flew thru space escaping the dark earth contact me i would really love telling my experience n full details
content.summary: At first it was a clear ball with corona around it

content.detailedDescription: I was in a big truck heading eastbound on the highway. i first noticed the object when i looked to the north-east at a very large red and white transmission tower mast (in the area of 1000ft tall i'd estimate). the tower being roughly a mile or more from my location on the highway. i noticed something that looked like a star in the sky, wasn't bright or twinkling but noticeable plain as day. it was hovering above the tower to it's west side and i noticed it move east and to the other side of the tower, the eastern side. the tower was obstructed by the treeline as we started going past on the highway and once the tower was back in sight, the object had disappeared and was nowhere to be seen. i had pointed it out to the truck driver but they were busy driving and by the time they looked the object was gone. it struck me as odd and kinda creeped me out for a little while.
content.summary: Looked like a star, hovered, moved and vanished.

content.detailedDescription: We were boating on the river.  wife took video. when we slowed down the video and object comes from behind the tree and goes across sky instantly. you can only see the object if you go frame by frame
content.summary: Video of object coming from behind tree and vanished

content.detailedDescription: In my car. noticed it 3 days ago. have been watching it ever since. it has been in the same spot in the sky (disappears in the day and fades and moves slightly in the night) sort of creepy and nearby helicopters from nearby army base don't seem to notice. it disappears during day like i said.
content.summary: The light keeps sending out a blinking light. also disappears during the day. sometimes moves. been here for weeks.
